Class Tutor

com.JayPi4c.RobbiSimulator.controller.tutor.Tutor
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITutor, Serializable, Remote
public class Tutor extends UnicastRemoteObject implements ITutor
ITutor implementation to handle the RMI invocations.

Jonas Pohl

    • getAnswer

      public Answer getAnswer(int id) throws RemoteException
      Description copied from interface: ITutor
      Fetches the answer for the given id. The answer will be null, if no answer is set.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      id - the id for the fetched answer
      Returns:
      the answer for the id or null, if no answer is set

      Optional of the oldest request or an empty Optional.
